headline: How Investors Are Reacting To American Tower (AMT) Q3 Beat And AI-Focused CoreSite Expansion
summary: In Q3 2025, American Tower Corporation reported strong financial results that exceeded analyst expectations, with higher revenue and net income helped by favorable foreign currency effects. The company also intensified its focus on developed markets and accelerated the growth of its CoreSite data center platform, which is being driven by demand for AI-related workloads alongside ongoing 5G and network densification projects. Next, we will examine how American Tower’s push into data centers...
